Title: Blood Lust
Plot: A taxi driver feels his cab strike something, then finds a teenage boy pinned beneath the left rear tire, apparently killed on impact. When Grissom arrives on the scene, he discovers that the teen has been eviscerated and has stab wounds, but shows no signs of having been struck by the taxi.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: William Winter, Eric Ritter, Victoria Prescott, Mary Jo Mrochinski, Tim Mikulecky, David Meunier, Matthew Kaminsky, Bryan Friday, Candace Edwards, Brandon Mauro, Michael Welch, James Macdonald, Gina Philips, Anju
